text: Francesco Saverio Salerno (August 27, 1928 - January 21, 2017) was a Roman Catholic bishop. Ordained to the priesthood in 1952, Salerno was named titular bishop of Cerveteri and secretary of the Apostolic Signatura, Italy, in 1997. He served as secretary from 1998 to 2003. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Italian Roman Catholic bishops Category:Members of the Apostolic Signatura
title: Francesco Saverio Salerno
